impactDescription:
i love this project and hope this project wi grow up. The Optimism Collective believes that building public goods should be rewarded.
This key ingredient to the Optimistic vision (opens new window)is more than just altruism – it’s core to our success. Optimism’s codebase itself is an open-source project, and builds on the shoulders of countless OSS giants which came before it.
pwFlaggedReason: Flag the application due to a clear violation of rule 1 - "Promises of future impact" as the applicant expresses hope that the project will grow in future and containing statements about the future price of the project.
